choose_system.description: Please select a system in which you want to set up the webhooks

webhooks.description: Please name your Webhooks. Leaving them empty will delete them.

delete_webhooks.description: Webhook configuration inconsistent. Webhooks with Home Assistant were already configured. If you continue they will be marked for removal.

abort.no_availible_webhooks: There are no availible webhooks in the ekey Bionyx plattform. Please delete some and try again.
abort.webhook_deletion_requested: Please go to the ekey Bionyx App and confirm the deletion of the webhooks. Afterwards set the integration up again.
